about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a dedicated Full-Stack Developer with a strong passion for crafting innovative, scalable, and user-centric web applications. With a robust skill set spanning HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, React-Redux, Node.js, MongoDB, Next.js, and Toast-Notify, I excel at building seamless, high-performance solutions that bridge front-end and back-end development. My experience includes designing responsive and intuitive user interfaces, implementing efficient state management with React-Redux, and developing robust server-side applications using Node.js and MongoDB. I leverage Next.js to create optimized, server-rendered applications that enhance performance and SEO. Beyond technical expertise, I am proficient in agile project management methodologies, utilizing tools like Jira and Kanban to streamline workflows, collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, and deliver projects on time. My approach emphasizes clean, maintainable code, adherence to best practices, and a commitment to continuous learning to stay at the forefront of modern web development trends. Whether solving complex technical challenges or creating delightful user experiences, I strive to deliver solutions that align with business objectives and exceed user expectations.

project1.title: Portfolio Website
project1.description: A modern portfolio built with React and Tailwind CSS.

project2.title: E-commerce API
project2.description: Backend service for an online store.
